# transportType

**Instance Property**

The type of conveyance to use for determining the travel time.

## Declaration

```swift
var transportType: MKDirectionsTransportType { get }
```

## Discussion

You specify the desired transportation type in your [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKDirections/Request] object. If you specified [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKDirectionsTransportType/any], this property contains the transportation type used to generate the estimated information.

## Getting the travel information

- **expectedTravelTime**: The expected travel time, in seconds.
- **expectedDepartureDate**: The expected departure time.
- **expectedArrivalDate**: The expected arrival time.
- **distance**: The expected travel distance, in meters.
